faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer_1: Absolutely! While IllustratorPro offers advanced features for professionals, it also includes intuitive tools and tutorials that make it accessible for beginners.
faq.question_2: Can I use IllustratorPro on multiple devices?
faq.answer_2: Yes, your IllustratorPro license allows you to use the software on up to two devices, and our cloud integration ensures your projects are always up to date.
faq.question_3: Do you offer a money-back guarantee?
faq.answer_3: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not satisfied with IllustratorPro, you can request a full refund within the first 30 days of your purchase.
faq.question_4: How often do you release updates?
faq.answer_4: We release minor updates and bug fixes monthly, with major feature updates typically released quarterly. All updates are free for subscribers.
faq.question_5: Can I import files from other illustration software?
faq.answer_5: Yes, IllustratorPro supports importing files from most major illustration software, including .ai, .psd, and .svg formats.
